entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Maniwaki
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.1Â°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
